phrases.text: as pure as the driven snow

definitions: operated, moved, or controlled by a specified person or source of power
shortDefinitions: operated, moved, or controlled by specified person or source of power

definitions: motivated or determined by a specified factor or feeling

examples.text: a market-driven response to customer needs

shortDefinitions: motivated or determined by specified factor or feeling

definitions: (of a person) relentlessly compelled by the need to accomplish a goal; very hard-working and ambitious

examples.text: my husband is a driven man

shortDefinitions: relentlessly compelled by need to accomplish goal

definitions: (of snow) piled into drifts or made smooth by the wind.
shortDefinitions: piled into drifts or made smooth by wind

phrases.text: as pure as the driven snow
